mapper.select: SELECT si.createTime create_time ,sum(si.total_money) total_money ,us.id user_id ,us.mobile user_mobile ,ca.name user_name ,ca.id_card id_card FROM merchant m JOIN supply_chain_order_info si on m.id = si.dest_Id JOIN user us ON us.id=m.user_id JOIN `0085_cashier` ca on ca.merchant_id=m.id WHERE dest_Id=#{merchant_id} AND si.createTime BETWEEN #{create_time} and #{now_time}

SELECT si.createTime create_time ,count(1) stock_count ,us.id user_id ,us.mobile user_mobile ,ca.name user_name ,ca.id_card id_card FROM merchant m JOIN supply_chain_order_info si on m.id = si.dest_Id JOIN user us ON us.id=m.user_id JOIN `0085_cashier` ca on ca.merchant_id=m.id WHERE dest_Id=#{merchant_id} AND si.createTime BETWEEN #{create_time} and #{now_time}
